sense.def:
To have a shock
pomeni nenadoma doživeti nekaj neprijetnega ali presenetljivega.

seg.quote: She got such a shock that she dropped the milk.
I recovered gradually from the shock of her death.
It was a shock to discover that they were English.

sense.def:
Shock
je čustveno ali telesno stanje osebe, ki se ji je zgodilo nekaj strašnega ali hudega.

seg.quote: Numb with shock, she stood watching as they took his body away.

sense.def:
V medicini je
shock
resno telesno stanje, pri katerem kri ne more normalno krožiti, na primer zato, ker je tista oseba doživela hujšo poškodbo.

seg.quote: She was taken to hospital suffering from shock.

sense.def:
A shock
je tudi majhen premik v nečem, kadar ob tisto zadene nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: This padding should absorb any sudden shocks.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shocks someone
, nekoga zelo vznemiri.

seg.quote: She was deeply shocked by her husband's death.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shocks someone
, je nekdo razburjen ali prizadet zaradi nečesa, kar se mu zdi nesramno ali moralno napačno.

A shock of hair
je gosta gmota las;

seg.quote: He was tall and handsome with a shock of hair falling over his forehead.
